Title: For Blood or Money
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Wendy Calhoun, Elmore Leonard (based on the short story "Fire in the Hole" by), Benjamin Cavell (story editor)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Joelle Carter, Jacob Pitts
Plot: Raylan helps Rachel find her brother in law, who has left a halfway house without permission to see his son on his birthday. He also begins investigating the oxy bus shooting and makes contact with the Dixie Mafia.
